name: Masthideals
overview:
Masthideals.com is the cool place for hot deals on spa, restaurants, pubs, resorts in your favourite cities like Chennai, Bangalore, New Delhi, Mumbai. We get you a great deal on a great stuff to do, eat, buy or see in your city. Great discounts of 50% or more on the best deals everyday on masthi deals website.

MasthiDeals Provides group discount coupon deals which might be provided by India retailers only. You can find attractive deals from restaurants, resorts, fitness, spa and much more. The discount ranges from 40-80 % and in some cases a flat 90% saving you tons of money. But the offer is only valid if they manage to sell a certain quantity within a specified time.

A great way to find cheap deals in Chennai to go online to the websites such as Masthideals.com. Currently they are offering services in for Delhi, Mumbai, and Bangalore but in the near future they would be expanding their reach to other cities too. So, don’t wait and enjoy the best discount deals in Chennai today.
